BaseStackName.Description: The name of the base stack

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the DynamoDB table

ApiGatewayName.Description: The name of the API Gateway

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function

DomElementId.Description: The ID of the DOM element

ApiGatewayPath.Description: The path under the base API Gateway

PowerShellScriptName.Description: The name of the PowerShell script for deploying the stack
